@switchboardHQ Very nice! Looking forward to meeting with you all with my UP coworkers in a few weeks!
@writemegwrite For sure. So much of the work to make it successful happens off-line & in preparation, which no one seems to grasp. #casesmc
@sophiemwolf Very cool! I might send you an email for more details.  :)  #casesmc
@writemegwrite @jcrabb @jpdoak Don't even get me started on ninja. THE WORST. #casesmc
@writemegwrite Yep yep yep. Amazing how it has so much potential for both good and bad. #casesmc
A4: Lots more hyper-targeted FB ads. It sucks to pay, but they can be super powerful. Also, continued focus on quality content. #casesmc
@writemegwrite @jpdoak @erinkv I'm FT, but SM is one point on a list of responsibilities: media relations, editing, videos, etc. #casesmc
@writemegwrite Totally. I've been playing with Medium lately. It's not perfect, but I like its potential for "one off" stories. #casesmc
@S_lo22 Nice. I've long thought about doing that, but have never made it happen. #casesmc
@CRuleSportsGuy @susangumula Because *everyone* knows how to do marketing, right? Sigh... #casesmc
A3: Maybe 15-20 folks that we send our stuff to regularly and ask them to share with their friends. From different class years, etc #casesmc
A3: Been thinking a lot about working to create an official alumni board of people who will be willing to promote our content. #casesmc
@CRuleSportsGuy @susangumula For me, it's people with PhDs in leadership. Not faculty, but definitely still from academia. #casesmc
@S_lo22 (cont) for video/photo projects that require extra time and staff, but I keep my calender *very* loose and react daily. #casesmc
@S_lo22 I'm probably in the minority, but I don't use one. SM is best when reacting in the moment. It's good to have a plan (cont) #casesmc
@CRuleSportsGuy @susangumula YES. But getting academics, who think everyone is interested in what they are, to grasp that concept? #casesmc
@susangumula (cont) because that's what's most popular. They don't see me posting all the "boring" promotional stuff too. #casesmc
@susangumula For me, I get a pushback for only doing "fun" or "silly" things. Problem is, that's all they see in their feeds (cont) #casesmc
@jpdoak Hey, thanks! If only I could actually *do* all the things I admire other colleges doing.  :)  #casesmc
@S_lo22 Agreed on Pinterest. I've resisted for a long time, but I think it's finally time. #casesmc
@post_kate @CASEAdvance My coworkers are sick of hearing me talk about this. It's my dream to have an integrated campaign. #casesmc
A2: Trying to get professors more involved. Blogging about current topics, etc. Providing value for the academic side is tough. #casesmc
@post_kate @CASEAdvance Totally totally totally.
A1: Greatest challenge - Getting higher-ups to grasp the value of good content vs. constant promotion. Success? I'm still employed! #casesmc
